entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
